bibl.title: Two Astronomical Papyri Revisited.
bibl.note: 1. P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 36041 + 26011, fr. n. [edd.: Pieter Johannes SIJPESTEIJN and Otto NEUGEBAUER, A New Version of Greek Planetary Tables, ZPE 37 (1980) pp. 285-293, 3 figg. et pl. XII]. Corrected transcription and discussion. - 2. P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 29370 + 29370b (= Pack2 2037). Datation (September-October, A.D. 471).
JONES Alexander, Two Astronomical Papyri Revisited.
